values: When I Don’t Desire God (Part 2)When I Don’t Desire God (Part 2)

If it’s true that God is most glorified in us when we are most satisfied in him, then the fight to be happy in God is the most important thing in life.If it’s true that God is most glorified in us when we are most satisfied in him, then the fight to be happy in God is the most important thing in life.
